arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid 5-2 Real Madrid: Three Takeaways From Woeful Day for Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: There are heaps to break down and criticize over Real Madrid’s defensive efforts on Saturday afternoon, but one thing stood out—their inability to defend set pieces. Four of Atlético Madrid’s five goals at the Metropolitano came either from a set piece or in the ensuing moments following a dead ball delivery.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid veteran finishes Atletico game with discomfort in leg; tests tomorrow
arts.sum: If the humiliating 2-5 defeat was already not enough, Real Madrid are returning from their short trip to the Riyadh Air Metropolitano with more problems. As confirmed earlier, Eder Militao hurt his ankle during the loss against Atletico Madrid and is a serious doubt for next week’s UEFA Champions League clash against Kairat Almaty. arts.ttl: Real Madrid captain reacts after humbling defeat vs Atletico – ‘We’re hit with the reality’
arts.sum: Dani Carvajal offered a very candid pitchside interview after Real Madrid’s heavy 5-2 defeat at the hands of cross-town rivals Atletico Madrid. The veteran Real Madrid defender was at a loss of words when asked about the performance against Atletico Madrid, who completely outclassed Los Blancos. Carvajal also talked about how Nico Gonzalez, the Atleti […] The post Real Madrid captain reacts after humbling defeat vs Atletico – ‘We’re hit with the reality’ appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Watch: Real Madrid teenager angrily kicks the ball into the stands during 5-2 loss to Atletico
arts.sum: Real Madrid suffered their first defeat under Xabi Alonso this season as they succumbed to a 5-2 defeat at the hands of cross-town rivals Atletico Madrid. The Spanish giants were completely outplayed from start to finish, failing to conjure any real momentum. The defensive lapses were particularly evident as Diego Simeone’s team plucked out the […] The post Watch: Real Madrid teenager angrily kicks the ball into the stands during 5-2 loss to Atletico appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Álvarez scores twice as Atletico crushes Real Madrid 5-2 in La Liga derby
arts.sum: Álvarez converted a penalty to put the hosts ahead 3-2 early in the second half before he added a second goal with a curling free kick. Julián Álvarez scored twice and Atletico Madrid routed fierce rival Real Madrid 5-2 in a thrilling Spanish league derby on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Alonso defends major selection decision after Atletico 5-2 Real Madrid – ‘We’ll learn from it’
arts.sum: Real Madrid were handed their first loss of the 2025/26 season, in the worst possible manner, as neighbours Atletico Madrid hammered them 5-2 at the Riyadh Air Metropolitano. The hosts were off the blocks early as Robin Le Normand gave them the lead, but Real Madrid fought back to take the lead through goals from […] The post Alonso defends major selection decision after Atletico 5-2 Real Madrid – ‘We’ll learn from it’ appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Simeone lifts curse - Atletico thrash Real Madrid in 75-year high
arts.sum: Diego Simeone finally vanquished the demons that have haunted him throughout his career after guiding his Atlético Madrid side to an emphatic 5-2 victory over Real Madrid. The Argentinian...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid defender a doubt for CL clash vs Kairat Almaty after injury against Atletico
arts.sum: Just when everything was going well for Real Madrid, it appears the club have been hit with an injury to one of the team’s most important defenders in Eder Militao. arts.ttl: Barcelona can go top of La Liga standings after Atletico hammer Real Madrid 5-2
arts.sum: FC Barcelona have been presented with a golden opportunity heading into their La Liga game against Real Sociedad on Sunday evening. The Blaugrana came into the matchweek on second place in the standings, two points behind leaders Real Madrid. arts.ttl: Julián Alvarez double floors Real Madrid to give five-star Atlético derby spoils
arts.sum: Julián Alvarez’s second-half double inspired Atlético Madrid to a crushing 5-2 victory against city rivals Real Madrid in La Liga
